translations: n.劣势；不利条件；损害（disadvantage 的复数）
v.使处于不利地位；使受损（disadvantage 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: Being 6ft 3in tall has some distinct disadvantages!
sentences.translation: 身高6英尺3英寸有明显的劣势！

sentences.sentence: Each of these systems has its advantages and disadvantages.
sentences.translation: 这些系统各有其优缺点。

sentences.sentence: The advantages of the scheme far outweighed the disadvantages.
sentences.translation: 这个计划的优点远远超过了缺点。
